Reviews.Title: great set for price
Reviews.Author: enjoy425
Reviews.Content: I bought htis set when on sale and it is the best investment that I have made works great and some features I like that is better then other companies,instead of going to menu all the time to change the setting for tv like 16:9 you just use the left right arrows and you can zoom in or out and set tv wide screen or normaal etc all with the arrows ,great feature and worked right out of the box and easy to set upgreat deal and tvjust as good as any set out there
